CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 19, 1945, pg. 25 reads: "Gay Doings - Merchant Seaman Theodore H. Bell was given a party by his father, Howard J. Bell, at their Northside home on Monday night. Mr. Bell is enjoying a thirty-day leave from sea duty. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of two women, one wearing plaid dress, and two men, including Theodore H. Bell on right, seated as couples on floral sofa, in home of Howard J. Bell, Northside, another version
